title: A Boy Called L
description: A street boy who doesn't want love. One night, one girl changes everything.I’m young. Homeless. And angry.I sell misery and pain to guys who get off on it.Am I into men? Nope.Sex? With my past. No thanks.But I want to stay alive, and a blowjob equals money which means I eat. And on the cycle goes. Until tonight when a girl who shivers in the rain, shocks my dead heart to life.This girl is everything.I don’t know her name, but I wish I did.There’s that saying—be careful what you wish for.But I had to learn the hard way, because my name is Lightning, and I don’t know what love is.A Boy Called L is an intro novella set four years earlier than Lightning Boy. It contains frequent strong language, sex scenes, and a character with abuse in his past. For mature audiences only.Damaged Souls. Golden hearts. Redemption.
author: Amy J. Heart
